about.title: Product Designer & Developer
about.description: Computer engineer with a product-focused mindset, working across product design and product development. I enjoy turning complex ideas into intuitive, scalable, and user-centered digital products, with a strong focus on clean UI, usability, and real-world impact, while currently focusing on building AI-powered products and scalable digital experiences.

hero.headline: PRODUCT DESIGNER & DEVELOPER
hero.description: Computer engineer focused on product design and development, creating user-centered digital products and working on AI-powered products.

dismas.summary: The software company I am a founding partner of in the KKTC implements its own projects and freelance projects. I worked in software development, UI design, and project management for a smart home control system.

intale.summary: I worked as a designer and developer on an AI-supported project that generated personalized children's fairy tales. I was also responsible for the web application design and WordPress landing page.

jotform_parttime.summary: I worked on improving the UI of Jotform by fixing responsiveness issues, RTL bugs, and layout problems using React.js and CSS/SCSS.

jotform_intern.summary: During my internship at Jotform, I developed a landing page and an admin panel, presenting my projects to the team and gaining experience with Flexbox and Grid layouts.

contact.title: CONTACT
contact.description: If you'd like to work together or just want to say hi, don't hesitate to drop me an email!

footer.openSourcePrefix: This portfolio is open source and the source code can be found on
